entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
